Index.meta_title: HoopSight AI - Computer Vision & AI-Powered Basketball Analytics
Index.meta_description: Transform your game with AI-powered basketball analytics. Automated player tracking, performance insights, and game predictions powered by computer vision and machine learning.

Hero.title: Transform your game with <important>AI-powered analytics</important>

Features.section_description: Comprehensive tools for players, coaches, and analysts powered by computer vision and machine learning.

Pricing.section_description: Scalable solutions for fans, players, teams, and organizations

FAQ.question: How accurate are your NBA predictions?
FAQ.answer: Our machine learning models achieve consistently high accuracy rates by analyzing multiple data points including historical performance, player statistics, team dynamics, and current form. We continuously refine our models to improve prediction accuracy.

CTA.title: Ready to revolutionize your basketball analytics?
CTA.description: Join fans, teams, and players already using HoopSight AI to gain a competitive edge.

PredictionsPage.meta_description: Track HoopSight AI's NBA game predictions, accuracy, and confidence for the 2025-26 season.
PredictionsPage.team_breakdown_helper: Each card shows the latest games, confidence, and how closely the predicted spread aligned with the result.
